name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ ロイズちゃん
summary:
ロイズちゃんは、マスターの命令で
一生懸命働きます！でも、イタズラされて
お仕事に集中できないようです。
--
Ultra-high resolution
Sweet ROIZ slaves away at the orders of her master.
Ultra-high resolution

Sweet ROIZ slaves away at the orders of her master.
But if you tease her too much, 
she won’t be able to concentrate on her work.
“Master…” Please don’t touch me that way…

With one tap she trembles and she moans softly.
But be careful not to miss or ROIZ will...
You can also use your pen to make her do as you wish.

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
